SDG_GOAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET: Target 16.9: By 2030, provide legal identity for all, including birth registration
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 16.9.1: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority, by age
STAT_CONC_DEF: Number of children under age of five whose births are reported as being registered with the relevant national civil authorities divided by the total number of children under the age of five in the population multiplied by 100
graph_title: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority, by age
indicator_name: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority, by age
